name: New York Hercules
description:
Show mortals how you kick ass by beating as many terrorists as you can before the time is up!

Crush trees to increase your multiplier and punch cars for more points.

Just don't attack the bystanders: they are here to enjoy the show!

NOTE: Before pressing enter/return to strat the game, type your name on the input field at the left bottom corner of the screen and click on submit to view your name in the highscore screen

Art by Daniel Minoh (Viajante dos Sonhos)                                                                  Programming by Matheus Braga (Matt_ZX)

Music and SFX: Internet Memes
